name: Ideal.sum_mem
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝ : Semiring α
I : Ideal α
ι : Type u_1
t : Finset ι
f : ι → α
a✝ : ∀ (c : ι), Membership.mem t c → Membership.mem I (f c)
⊢ Membership.mem I (t.sum fun i => f i)
decl:
theorem sum_mem (I : Ideal α) {ι : Type*} {t : Finset ι} {f : ι → α} :
    (∀ c ∈ t, f c ∈ I) → (∑ i ∈ t, f i) ∈ I :=
  Submodule.sum_mem I
